title: Twitter was fined $350,000 for failing to turn over Trump’s data
description: An unsealed ruling shows that the special counsel investigating Jan. 6 requested the records under seal in January.

title: Google’s AI ambassador walks a fine line between hype and doom
description: James Manyika signed a statement saying that artificial intelligence could pose an existential threat to humanity. Like much of Silicon Valley, he’s forging ahead.

title: How to make Slack less chaotic and easier to manage
description: Workplace communications tools shouldn’t be annoying. Save some items for later, learn how to focus your screen or silence some notifications.

title: Are you smarter than a scammer? Play this game.
description: Scams are everywhere, and scammers are relentless. Think you know how to best avoid falling for a scam? Take our quiz and find out.

title: AI is being used to give dead, missing kids a voice they didn’t ask for
description: The videos show the likeness of Gabriel Fernández, James Bulger and Madeleine McCann narrating their deaths or disappearances in child-like voices.
